pages.text: To discover crafting, uses, and many other things, you can use $(l)$(2)JEI$().$(br2)When you're hovering over an item, press $(l)$(#f00)R$() to see the crafting recipe, and $(l)U$() for the uses.$(br2)If you want to see all the functions, you can look at the $(l)key bindings$() in the control settings menu.
